block.p: ''Coffins, Urns and Webcast Funerals'' (Oct. 5) did not mention those ministers among us who are doing a lot of traditional work in cyberspace. My husband and I have been doing an Internet ministry since 1994. Our biggest memorial to date is the online interactive one we did for Jerry Garcia. We had people from every continent mourning online together.
